title: Restarting issue
content:
Hi this is Kalam Krishnmohan Reddy
User of Google pixel phone . I have an issue with my pixel phone when I try to restart my mobile it's getting switch off and not getting ON . 
This issue Already I discussed with your team member .but still now i didn't get any update from your team .. can you please check and update me about this issue 

Quick response will be appreciated.
Thanks
